item.title: New England Summer 2018
item.description: Vermont & New Hampshire Trip Day 1 June 29 Landed at Newark Airport Ate Roti falafel for lunch Started driving toward New Haven Dinner at Frank Pepe Pizza Started driving towards Barnet, VT at around 8.00 pm Reached the rented house at 1.30 am. It was an adventure to locate the house late at night with no cell phone reception. The house was impressive, location was great and it felt that there was no other soul around us.

item.title: Europe Summer 2017
item.description: Europe Summer 2017 Trip Countries visited Switzerland, Italy, Montenegro, Greece, Croatia Day 1 As hurricane harvey was approaching US the trip was in serious doubt. But luckily the planes left before the hurricane made landfall. We landed next day in Zurich Took the train from Zurich to Bern, then Bern to Interlaken, and then Interlaken to Grindelwald Reached Grindlewald hotel around 4 pm Had greasy pizza for dinner, then had a relaxing evening while a band played American country music Grindelwald Hotel

item.title: New Zealand 2014
item.description: New Zealand Fall 2014 Trip Countries visited New Zealand & Tahiti Day 1, Oct 27 2014 Left from LA on Oct 26th to Papeete and then from Papeete to Auckland (Air Tahiti Nui) Arrived in Auckland on the afternoon of Oct 27th, and checked into the Waldorf Stadium Apartment Hotel Since we were travelling with an infant we selected a hotel with kitchen The apartments had kitchen and other facilities to cook our own food Had pizza for Dinner and then walked around the city and went grocery shopping Auckland Hotel
